creditline: Gift of Leo A. and Doris Hodroff
description: octagonal platter central Qilin in iron-red, gilt and green, borders with arms of Wolff Family
medium: Porcelain with enamel and gilded decoration
text: The crest on this octagonal dish could be of Wolff, Pemberton or Croachrod.
title: Platter with Wolff family arms
